PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Among the variety of conjugated polymers that have been studied , poly(p-phenylenevinylene) ( PPV ) , 2 poly(alkylfluorene) ( PF ) , and polythiophene ( PT ) 3 derivatives are typical p - type electron donor materials.

Let's think step by step.

1. Among the variety of conjugated polymers: This is a property or characteristic of the text, describing the type of polymers being discussed. It is not a specific entity.
2. poly(p-phenylenevinylene) (PPV): This is a specific type of conjugated polymer, and can be considered a Property Value entity, representing the value of the polymer type "poly(p-phenylenevinylene)".
3. 2 poly(alkylfluorene) (PF): This is another specific type of conjugated polymer, and can be considered a Property Value entity, representing the value of the polymer type "poly(alkylfluorene)".
4. and polythiophene (PT): This is a third specific type of conjugated polymer, and can be considered a Property Value entity, representing the value of the polymer type "polythiophene".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PPV: This is a Property Value entity, representing the value of the material property "poly(p-phenylenevinylene)".
2. PF: This is a Property Value entity, representing the value of the material property "poly(alkylfluorene)".
3. PT: This is a Property Value entity, representing the value of the material property "polythiophene".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".
